subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Jaromir Jagr is headed to the Olympics for a fifth time, with the Czech Republic, but roster selections for the Sochi Games have not been without controversy and more is sure to follow.
snippet: Jaromir Jagr is headed to the Olympics for a fifth time, with the Czech Republic, but roster selections for the Sochi Games have not been without controversy and more is sure to follow.
